text: Clinton Darryl "Clint" Mansell (born 7 January 1963 in Coventry, England) is an English musician, composer, and was also the lead singer and guitarist of the band Pop Will Eat Itself. He is known for scores on movies. Some of the most famous movies that he has scored are Requiem for a Dream, The Fountain, Moon, Smokin' Aces, The Wrestler, and Black Swan. His composition has become very popular and has been used in many advertisements and movie trailers. ==Scoring credits== Mansell has scored many movies: Year Film 1998 Pi 2000 Requiem for a Dream 2001 World Traveler 2001 The Hole 2001 Knockaround Guys 2001 Rain 2002 Abandon 2002 Murder by Numbers 2002 Sonny 2002 The Hire: Ticker 2003 11:14 2004 Suspect Zero 2005 Sahara 2005 Doom 2006 The Fountain 2006 Trust the Man 2006 Smokin' Aces 2007 Wind Chill 2007 In The Wall 2008 Definitely, Maybe 2008 The Wrestler 2009 Blood: The Last Vampire 2009 Moon 2009 L'affaire Farewell 2010 The Rebound 2010 Black Swan 2010 Last Night 2010 Faster 2011 Mass Effect 3 (Video game) ==Other websites== *Clint Mansell at the Internet Movie Database Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:English composers Category:English rock musicians Category:Entertainers from Coventry
title: Clint Mansell
